= DAYSIM subprograms =

[http://web.mit.edu/SustainableDesignLab/projects/Daysim/Daysim_flowchart.html Great resource for understanding how programs link together]

*radfiles2daysim*
To work, needs to be run with three completely undocumented switches, a la:
{{{
>radfiles2daysim header.hea -d -m -g
}}}

*gen_directsunlight*
If there are no blinds specified, this program doesn't need to be run
